page.title: 04BODIAM C.E. SCHOOL CHILDREN
page.content: Most of the children are able to walk to the school, some go by car and a few cycle. Amongst the senior pupils the most popular academic subjects are Maths and English, but Science and French are popular too. A number of children enjoy Sports Club after school and they can use the swimming pool in the Summer holidays. Many of the children like to spend their spare time cycling, horse riding and participating in other outdoor activities with their families. Indoor activities include reading, drawing, sewing and watching television. Almost every child's parents own a car, and the majority of the family shopping is done in Hastings. Less than half of the working parents are employed within the village; a good many travel to surrounding villages and a few to London.
